title: Kyler Murray gets paid; Super Bowl favorites; Mayo in Coffee? Buccaneers S Logan Ryan
itunes:title: Kyler Murray gets paid; Super Bowl favorites; Mayo in Coffee? Buccaneers S Logan Ryan
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast starts with their reaction to Kyler Murray’s contract extension. Hosts Will Selva, James Palmer, Mike Garafolo, and Super Bowl champion Shaun O’Hara share how expectations change for Kyler now that he received a big pay day and then the guys discuss if the Los Angeles Rams should be considered the Super Bowl favorites. Later, the GMFB team plays their version of jeopardy and then they finish up being joined by Tampa Bay Buccaneers safety Logan Ryan and he talks about his goals for the 2022 season, reuniting with Tom Brady, and a potential Rob Gronkowski return.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
